at.qe.timeguess.services

Class CategoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.qe.timeguess.services.CategoryService

  • @Service
 @Scope(value="application")
public class CategoryService
extends Object
    This class represents the Service with which Categories get managed. It is possible to create, delete Categories, and to find Categories by specific properties as well.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CategoryService.CategoryAlreadyExistsException
      Gets thrown when a Category is tried to be created and saved, which already exists in the database
      static class  CategoryService.CategoryIsReferencedInCompletedGamesException
      Gets thrown when a Category is tried to be deleted, which is referenced in the persisted completed games

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CategoryService()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void deleteCategory(Category category)
      Deletes a Category, except when it is referenced in the completed games
      Collection<Category> getAllCategories()
      Returns all Categories

      Returns Category which is searched by a given ID

      Returns Category which is searched by a given name
      boolean isDeletable(Category category)
      Checks if a Category is deletable, based on occurrences in completed Games

      Saves a new Category for Expressions

        Returns all Categories
        Returns:

      • getCategoryById

        public Category getCategoryById(Long id)
        Returns Category which is searched by a given ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ID which the Category is searched by
        Returns:
        the Category found by the ID

      • getCategoryByName

        public Category getCategoryByName(String name)
        Returns Category which is searched by a given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name which the Category is searched by
        Returns:
        the Category found by the name

      • isDeletable

        public boolean isDeletable(Category category)
        Checks if a Category is deletable, based on occurrences in completed Games
        Parameters:
        category - the Category for which is checked if it is deletable
        Returns:
        true or false, whether the Category is deletable

      • saveCategory

        public Category saveCategory(Category category)
                      throws CategoryService.CategoryAlreadyExistsException
        Saves a new Category for Expressions
        Parameters:
        category - the Category to save
        Returns:
        the Category that got saved in the database
        Throws:
        CategoryService.CategoryAlreadyExistsException - if a Category to save already exists

      • deleteCategory

        public void deleteCategory(Category category)
                    throws CategoryService.CategoryIsReferencedInCompletedGamesException
        Deletes a Category, except when it is referenced in the completed games
        Parameters:
        category - the Category to delete
        Throws:
        CategoryService.CategoryIsReferencedInCompletedGamesException - if the Category to be deleted is referenced in the persisted completed games
